import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { Table, Title, Modal, Loader, QuickAddPlayersToGame } from "./"; import { useForm } from "../hooks"; import { EditPlayerStatsModal, AddPlayerGameStatsModal } from "./modals"; const initialState = { opponent_goals_for: 0, opponent_ground_balls: 0, opponent_shots: 0, opponent_faceoffs_won: 0, opponent_penalties_in_minutes: 0, location: '', opponent: '' } const EditGame = ({ setIsEditing, playerHeaders, playerColumns }) => { const { game, players } = useSelector(state => ({ ...state.games, ...state.players })); const [showEditPlayerStatsModal, setShowEditPlayerStatsModal] = useState(false); const [showAddPlayerStatsModal, setShowAddPlayerStatsModal] = useState(false); const [_playerHeaders, _setPlayerHeaders] = useState(playerHeaders); const [_playerColumns, _setPlayerColumns] = useState(playerColumns); const [selectedPlayer, setSelectedPlayer] = useState(null); const { fields, handleChange, errors, validate } = useForm(game); // console.log(fields, 'eidt game fils') // console.log(game, 'game') useEffect(() => { _setPlayerHeaders([...playerHeaders, { label: '' }]); _setPlayerColumns({ ...playerColumns, edit: { type: 'button', func: (e) => { setShowEditPlayerStatsModal(true) setSelectedPlayer(e) }, as: 'Edit', className: 'w-0 whitespace-nowrap' } }) }, []) const { opponent, location, player_stats } = game; return ( <> {(closeModal) => } {(closeModal) => }

) } export default EditGame;
